title.rendered: North-Wright Airways in Norman Wells, Northwest Territories, Canada

content.rendered:
North-Wright Airways is an airline based in Norman Wells, Northwest Territories, Canada. It operates commuter services to several communities in the Northwest Territories, and charter services. Its main base is Norman Wells Airport and they operate the Norman Wells Water Aerodrome. The airline was established in 1986 and used to be known since 1979 as Nahanni Air Services and North Wright Air.

North-Wright Airways in Norman Wells, Canada Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: Bag Service 2200,
Norman Wells, NT, X0E 0V0, Canada

Phone: (867) 587-2288 ex 1001

Reservations – 867-587-2333 ex 1000

Cargo – 867-587-2333 ex 1003

Fax: (867) 587-2962

Email: info@north-wrightairways.com

Customer Service – reservations@north-wrightairways.com
Human Resources – hr@north-wrightairways.com
Charters – charters@north-wrightairways.com
Dispatch – dispatch@north-wrightairways.com
Accounting – acct@north-wrightairways.com
Quality Assurance – qa@north-wrightairways.com
Maintenance – production.manager@north-wrightairways.com
Cargo– cargo@north-wrightairways.com

Yellowknife Office

Address: 111 McMillan St.
Yellowknife, NT X1A 3T2

Phone: (867) 920-4287

Fax: (867) 873-4315

Inuvik Office

Address: Mike Zubko Airport
Inuvik, NT X0E 0T0

Charters/Administration – (867) 777-2220
Reservations/Cargo – (867) 678-2749

Fax: (867) 678-2534

Working hours: NA

North-Wright Airways Official website: https://north-wrightairways.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with North-Wright Airways

Total fleet: 18

  • Beech 99
  • Beechcraft 1900
  • Cessna 172
  • Cessna 185
  • Cessna 206
  • Cessna 207
  • Cessna 208 Grand Caravan
  • de Havilland Canada DHC-6 Twin Otter
  • Helio Courier
  • Pilatus PC-6 Porter

North-Wright Airways Baggage Allowance

View North-Wright Airways Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Arrangements in North-Wright Airways

  • If special assistance is required (i.e wheelchair needed) or if you are travelling with an infant, please inform the booking agent in order for our flight crew to be notified.
  • Our goal is to make your flight experience much easier by preparing the means necessary to travel you safely to your destination.

Traveling with an Live Animals in North-Wright Airways

  • If travelling with an animal or oversized baggage, please notify the reservation agent when booking your ticket or indicate on the special notes field if booked online.
  • This should be done at least 24 hours prior to travelling to ensure space. This way, our staff our able to prepare in order to safely deliver them to their destinations.

For more details: https://north-wrightairways.com/traveller-information

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the North-Wright Airways in Norman Wells, Canada Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the North-Wright Airways in Norman Wells, Canada: (click on the stars below)
